titleInfo.title: Coll 29/98(2) 'Ahwaz: Consulate-General; transfer from GOI to FO establishment; question of allowances'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 23; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the transfer of the British Vice-Consulate at Ahwaz from the Government of India to the Foreign Office, and the Vice-Consul's allowances.The file contains internal correspondence between the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, the Foreign Office, the India Office, the British Legation at Tehran, and the Government of India.
